spell_tooltip.description:
You strangle the target with demonic magic, stunning them in place and dealing 831,729 Shadow damage over 5 sec while the target is grasped. Can move while channeling.

Use Illidan's Grasp again to toss the target to a location within 20 yards.
Reduces the cooldown of your Sigils by an additional 25%.
Imprison's PvP duration is increased by 1 sec, and targets become immune to damage and healing while imprisoned.
Infernal Strike gains an additional charge.

Place a Sigil of Misery at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Causes all enemies affected by the sigil to cower in fear, disorienting them for 15 sec.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.
You heal for 4% of all Fire damage you deal.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 50,483 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Increases your chance to parry by 3%.
Throw Glaive has 2 charges and 10 yard increased range.

Charge to your target and deal 142,861 Fire damage.

Fracture has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.

Generates 40 Fury.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by 6%.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Immolation Aura increases your armor by 20% and causes melee attackers to suffer 21,944 Fire damage.
Spectral Sight has 5 sec reduced cooldown and no longer reduces movement speed.
Reduces magic damage taken by 5%.
Fel Devastation causes you to enter demon form for 5 sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Increases maximum health by 5%.
All Sigils are now placed at your target's location.
Increases your mastery by 3.6%.
Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil generates 1 Lesser Soul Fragment.
All Sigils activate 1 second faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Metamorphosis by 60 sec.
Enemies deal 8% reduced magic damage to you for 8 sec after being afflicted by one of your Sigils.
Sigil of Flame deals 70% increased damage and generates 2 additional Fury per target hit.

Charge to your target, striking them for 1.1 million Chaos damage, rooting them in place for 1.5 sec and inflicting 893,909 Chaos damage over 6 sec to up to 5 enemies in your path. 

The pursuit invigorates your soul, healing you for 25% of the damage you deal to your Hunt target for 20 sec.

Place a demonic sigil at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Detonates to deal 837,249 Chaos damage and shatter up to 3 Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Unleash the fel within you, damaging enemies directly in front of you for 539,743 Fire damage over 2 sec. Causing damage also heals you for up to 759,655 health.

Enemies struck by Sigil of Flame are afflicted with Frailty for 6 sec.

You heal for 8% of all damage you deal to targets with Frailty.
Brand an enemy with a demonic symbol, instantly dealing 378,563 Fire damage and 352,049 Fire damage over 12 sec. The enemy's damage done to you is reduced by 40% for 12 sec.

Rapidly slash your target for 256,916 Physical damage, and shatter 2 Lesser Soul Fragments from them.

Generates 25 Fury.
Demon Spikes also increases your Parry chance by 10% for 10 sec.

Sigil of Flame's initial damage is increased by 50%.

Multiple applications of Sigil of Flame may overlap.
Reduces the cooldown of Throw Glaive by 6 sec.
You take 12% reduced damage after Demon Spikes ends, fading by 1% per second.

Place a Sigil of Silence at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Silences all enemies affected by the sigil for 2 sec.

Consume up to 5 available Soul Fragments then explode, damaging nearby enemies for 65,836 Fire damage per fragment consumed, and afflicting them with Frailty for 6 sec, causing you to heal for 8% of damage you deal to them. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Immolation Aura increases your movement speed by 10% and its duration is increased by 50%.
Increases the duration of Demon Spikes by 2 sec.
Fire damage increased by 8%.

Frailty now also reduces all damage you take from afflicted targets by 3%.

Enemies struck by Soul Cleave are afflicted with Frailty for 6 sec.
Immolation Aura's initial burst has a chance to shatter Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies.
You take 10% reduced magic damage while Immolation Aura is active.

Consuming a Soul Fragment reduces all damage you take by 2% for 6 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.

Place a Sigil of Chains at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

All enemies affected by the sigil are pulled to its center and are snared, reducing movement speed by 70% for 6 sec.
Fiery Brand also increases Fire damage you deal to the target by 30%.
When consuming a Soul Fragment would heal you above full health it shields you instead, up to a maximum of 1.6 million.
Sigil of Flame reduces the cooldown of your Sigils by 5 sec.
Frailty now also increases all damage you deal to afflicted targets by 4%.
Consuming a Soul Fragment reduces the remaining cooldown of Demon Spikes by 0.35 sec.
Immolation Aura damage increases the duration of your Fiery Brand and Sigil of Flame by 0.50 sec.

Multiple applications of Frailty may overlap.

Soul Cleave applies Frailty to your primary target for 8 sec.

Sigil of Flame has 5 sec reduced cooldown and 1 additional charge.

You have 12% increased chance to parry attacks from enemies afflicted by your Sigil of Flame.

Metamorphosis now also greatly empowers Soul Cleave and Spirit Bomb.

While demon form is active, the first cast of each empowered ability induces a Demonsurge, causing you to explode with Fel energy, dealing 549,560 Fire damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Chaos Nova slows enemies by 60% and reduces attack and cast speed 15% for 5 sec after its stun fades.

Demonsurge deals 50% increased damage when it strikes a single target.

Each additional target reduces this bonus by 10%.

5% of all non-Fire damage taken is instead taken as Fire damage over 6 sec.

Fire damage taken reduced by 10%.
Your blades burn with Fel energy, causing your Soul Cleave, Throw Glaive, and auto-attacks to deal an additional 40% damage as Fire over 6 sec.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of your Sigil of Flame and Fel Devastation are immediately reset.
The effects of your demon form persist outside of it in a weakened state, increasing maximum health by 5% and Armor by 20%.
Maximum Fury increased by 50.
Sigil of Flame applies Student of Suffering to you, increasing Mastery by 14.4% and granting 5 Fury every 2 sec, for 6 sec.
Agility increased by 8% while not in demon form.

Activating Metamorphosis greatly empowers Fel Devastation, Immolation Aura, and Sigil of Flame.

Demonsurge damage is increased by 10% for each time it previously triggered while your demon form is active.
Infernal Strike gains an additional charge.

Place a Sigil of Misery at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Causes all enemies affected by the sigil to cower in fear, disorienting them for 15 sec.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
You heal for 4% of all Fire damage you deal.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 49,569 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Increases your chance to parry by 3%.

Charge to your target and deal 143,737 Fire damage.

Fracture has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.

Generates 40 Fury.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by 6%.

When you parry an attack or have one of your attacks parried, restore 2% of max health and 10 Fury. 

This effect may only occur once every 5 sec.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Immolation Aura increases your armor by 20% and causes melee attackers to suffer 22,156 Fire damage.
Spectral Sight has 5 sec reduced cooldown and no longer reduces movement speed.
Reduces magic damage taken by 5%.
Fel Devastation causes you to enter demon form for 5 sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Increases maximum health by 5%.
All Sigils are now placed at your target's location.
Increases your mastery by 3.6%.
Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil generates 1 Lesser Soul Fragment.
All Sigils activate 1 second faster.
The cooldown of Infernal Strike is reduced by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Metamorphosis by 60 sec.
Sigil of Flame deals 70% increased damage and generates 2 additional Fury per target hit.
Fel Devastation summons an allied Havoc Demon Hunter who casts Eye Beam, dealing 426,394 Chaos damage over 1.6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Place a demonic sigil at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Detonates to deal 844,402 Chaos damage and shatter up to 3 Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Unleash the fel within you, damaging enemies directly in front of you for 545,148 Fire damage over 2 sec. Causing damage also heals you for up to 751,019 health.

Enemies struck by Sigil of Flame are afflicted with Frailty for 6 sec.

You heal for 8% of all damage you deal to targets with Frailty.
Brand an enemy with a demonic symbol, instantly dealing 374,335 Fire damage and 352,049 Fire damage over 12 sec. The enemy's damage done to you is reduced by 40% for 12 sec.

Rapidly slash your target for 258,151 Physical damage, and shatter 2 Lesser Soul Fragments from them.

Generates 25 Fury.
Demon Spikes also increases your Parry chance by 10% for 10 sec.

Sigil of Flame's initial damage is increased by 50%.

Multiple applications of Sigil of Flame may overlap.
Reduces the cooldown of Throw Glaive by 6 sec.
You take 12% reduced damage after Demon Spikes ends, fading by 1% per second.
Fel Devastation heals you for up to 50% more, based on your missing health.

Consume up to 5 available Soul Fragments then explode, damaging nearby enemies for 66,954 Fire damage per fragment consumed, and afflicting them with Frailty for 6 sec, causing you to heal for 8% of damage you deal to them. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Increases the duration of Demon Spikes by 2 sec.
Fire damage increased by 8%.

Frailty now also reduces all damage you take from afflicted targets by 3%.

Enemies struck by Soul Cleave are afflicted with Frailty for 6 sec.
Immolation Aura's initial burst has a chance to shatter Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies.

Immolation Aura generates 5-10 Fury when it deals critical damage.

This effect may only occur once per 1 sec.
You take 10% reduced magic damage while Immolation Aura is active.
Every 10 Soul Fragments you consume increases the damage of your next Soul Cleave or Spirit Bomb by 40%.

Consuming a Soul Fragment reduces all damage you take by 1% for 6 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Fiery Brand also increases Fire damage you deal to the target by 30%.
Soul Cleave deals 50% increased damage to your primary target.
Fel Devastation damage increased by 35%.
Sigil of Flame reduces the cooldown of your Sigils by 5 sec.
Frailty now also increases all damage you deal to afflicted targets by 4%.
Consuming a Soul Fragment reduces the remaining cooldown of Demon Spikes by 0.35 sec.
Immolation Aura damage increases the duration of your Fiery Brand and Sigil of Flame by 0.50 sec.

Multiple applications of Frailty may overlap.

Soul Cleave applies Frailty to your primary target for 8 sec.
Fiery Brand has 12 sec reduced cooldown and 1 additional charge.
Movement speed increased by 1% per 10 Fury.

Demonsurge deals 50% increased damage when it strikes a single target.

Each additional target reduces this bonus by 10%.

5% of all non-Fire damage taken is instead taken as Fire damage over 6 sec.

Fire damage taken reduced by 10%.

Infernal Strike gains an additional charge.

You heal for 8% of all damage you deal to targets with Frailty.

Demonsurge damage is increased by 10% for each time it previously triggered while your demon form is active.
Reduces the cooldown of your Sigils by an additional 25%.
Immolation Aura dispels a magical effect on you when cast.
Vengeful Retreat provides immunity to loss of control effects, and reduces damage taken by 35% until you land.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 26,517 Physical damage.
Infernal Strike gains an additional charge.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.
You heal for 4% of all Fire damage you deal.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 50,223 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Consume 1 beneficial Magic effect removing it from the target.
Throw Glaive has 2 charges and 10 yard increased range.

Charge to your target and deal 145,161 Fire damage.

Fracture has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.

Generates 40 Fury.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by 6%.
Mastery increases your movement speed.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Spectral Sight has 5 sec reduced cooldown and no longer reduces movement speed.
Reduces magic damage taken by 5%.
Fel Devastation causes you to enter demon form for 5 sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Increases maximum health by 5%.
All Sigils are now placed at your target's location.
Increases your mastery by 3.6%.

Summons darkness around you in an 8 yd radius, granting friendly targets a 15% chance to avoid all damage from an attack. Lasts 8 sec.

Chance to avoid damage increased by 100% when not in a raid.
Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil generates 1 Lesser Soul Fragment.
All Sigils activate 1 second faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Darkness by 120 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Metamorphosis by 60 sec.
Sigil of Flame deals 70% increased damage and generates 2 additional Fury per target hit.

Charge to your target, striking them for 1 million Chaos damage, rooting them in place for 1.5 sec and inflicting 893,909 Chaos damage over 6 sec to up to 5 enemies in your path. 

The pursuit invigorates your soul, healing you for 25% of the damage you deal to your Hunt target for 20 sec.

Place a demonic sigil at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Detonates to deal 834,922 Chaos damage and shatter up to 3 Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Blasts all enemies in front of you, for up to 939,196 Chaos damage over 1.6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Your auto attacks deal an additional 21,699 Shadow damage and generate 7-12 Fury.
Immolation Aura generates an additional 36 Fury over 9 sec.
Blade Dance deals 298,990 Chaos damage to the first target struck.
Throw Glaive deals 60% increased damage, reduced by 30% for each previous enemy hit.
Magical damage increased by 3%, and Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.

Blur now reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.

Additionally, you automatically trigger Blur with 50% reduced cooldown and duration when you fall below 35% health. This effect can only occur when Blur is not on cooldown.
You deflect incoming attacks while Blade Dancing, absorbing damage up to 15% of your maximum health.

Damaging an enemy before they damage you increases your critical strike chance by 10% for 5 sec.

Vengeful Retreat refreshes your potential to trigger this effect on any enemies you are in combat with.
Increases Versatility by 4% and reduces threat generated by 8%.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of Blade Dance and Eye Beam are immediately reset.
Throw Glaive now costs 25 Fury and throws a second glaive at the target.
The final slash of Blade Dance inflicts an additional 92,393 Chaos damage over 4 sec.
Eye Beam generates 40 Fury every second, and its damage and duration are increased by 20%.
Eye Beam deals guaranteed critical strikes.
Immolation Aura's damage increases by 10% each time it deals damage.
When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
Enemies hit by Chaos Strike or Throw Glaive take 15% increased damage from Chaos Strike and Throw Glaive for 15 sec.

Demon's Bite and Throw Glaive leave open wounds on your enemies, dealing 94,253 Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 40%.

May be applied to up to 3 targets.

Entering demon form causes your next Chaos Strike to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal 273,330 Chaos damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Throw Glaive causes targets to take an additional 80% of damage dealt as Chaos over 6 sec.

Each time Immolation Aura deals damage, 30% of the damage dealt by up to 3 critical strikes is gathered as Ragefire.

When Immolation Aura expires you explode, dealing all stored Ragefire damage to nearby enemies.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 80% of your critical strike chance.
Activating Eye Beam reduces the cooldown of your next Eye Beam by 5.0 sec, stacking up to 20 sec.
Your Chaos damage has a 7.77% chance to be increased by 17%, occurring up to 7 total times.

Immolation Aura has 1 additional charge, 30% chance to refund a charge when used, and deals Chaos damage instead of Fire.

You can have multiple Immolation Auras active at a time.
Blade Dance automatically triggers Throw Glaive on your primary target for 100% damage and each slash has a 50% chance to Throw Glaive an enemy for 35% damage.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Soul Cleave casts 3 additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Fracture, cast 6 slashes instead.
Vengeful Retreat resets the cooldown of Felblade.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Fracture applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take 7% increased damage for 20 sec. 

If cast after Soul Cleave, Reaver's Mark is increased to 14%.
The second enhanced ability in a pattern shatters an additional Soul Fragment.
Each Soul Fragment you consume shields you for an additional 10% of the amount healed.

Expose weaknesses in the target of your Reaver's Mark, causing your Physical damage to any enemy to also deal 20% of the damage dealt to your marked target as Chaos, and sometimes shatter a Lesser Soul Fragment.
Soul Cleave deals 10% increased damage.
Throw Glaive deals 23,763 Physical damage to enemies near its initial target.
Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Fracture to deal 47,527 additional Physical damage.
After consuming both enhancements, gain Thrill of the Fight, increasing your attack speed by 15% for 20 sec and your damage and healing by 15% for 10 sec.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 27,405 Physical damage.
Infernal Strike gains an additional charge.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
You heal for 4% of all Fire damage you deal.

Mastery increases your movement speed.

The final slash of Blade Dance deals an additional 50% damage.
The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat increase your damage by 5% for 20 sec.
When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.

Your Chaos damage has a 7.77% chance to be increased by 17%, occurring up to 7 total times.
Slash all enemies in front of you for 361,058 Chaos damage, and increase the damage your Chaos Strike and Blade Dance deal to them by 80% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
The duration of your active demon form is extended by 0.1 sec per 12 Fury spent.
Blade Dance automatically triggers Throw Glaive on your primary target for 100% damage and each slash has a 50% chance to Throw Glaive an enemy for 35% damage.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Soul Cleave casts 3 additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Fracture, cast 6 slashes instead.
Vengeful Retreat resets the cooldown of Felblade.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Fracture applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take 7% increased damage for 20 sec. 

If cast after Soul Cleave, Reaver's Mark is increased to 14%.
The second enhanced ability in a pattern shatters an additional Soul Fragment.
Each Soul Fragment you consume shields you for an additional 10% of the amount healed.

Expose weaknesses in the target of your Reaver's Mark, causing your Physical damage to any enemy to also deal 20% of the damage dealt to your marked target as Chaos, and sometimes shatter a Lesser Soul Fragment.
Soul Cleave deals 10% increased damage.
Reaver's Glaive generates 20 Fury.
Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Fracture to deal 47,527 additional Physical damage.
After consuming both enhancements, gain Thrill of the Fight, increasing your attack speed by 15% for 20 sec and your damage and healing by 15% for 10 sec.
